records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about how to weather forecast in Shajapur district?
records.KccAns: Shujalpur 1 – 3 Day Weather Forecast Summary: Mostly dry. Warm (max 34°C on Fri afternoon, min 24°C on Wed night). Mainly fresh winds.Shujalpur 7 – 10 Day Weather Forecast Summary: Heavy rain (total 46mm), heaviest during Thu afternoon. Warm (max 36°C on Wed afternoon, min 26°C on Thu night).
